alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 1:36AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Dawson County through 215 AM CDT... At 136 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Arnold to Maxwell to Wallace. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gothenburg. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 217. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
